ModMetaData.name: AutoDrillRemastered
ModMetaData.author: Verakum
ModMetaData.description:
I am not the original developer of the mod, The credit goes to, Honshitsu, RedFrog and Pagan.
Having said that I am taking the mod development for now, the code will be available and free for download on my github. https://github.com/Verakum/RWAutodrillRemastered
Mod Version v1.0.2 - Added the option to enable or disable if infestations can spawn from these drills. - Added all the drills configurations to a settings menu. - Added the setting to allow the display of found minerals when selecting the drill. - Changed the mod so that it doesn't try to mine other type of minerals that are not of "thingCategory" ResourceRaw. Mainly to avoid issues with Mod Vanilla Helixien Gas Expanded.
Mod Version v1.0.1 changes and functionality are below.
Why stand around a drill all day? You've got better things to do! Automated drills!
Speed based on a lv10 miner. Output yield scales with vanilla difficulty.
Basic AutoDrill - standard size bore (2 radius, 3x3) - average drill cycle of 5.5 hours - 80% deposit consumption - 80% resource output - Can trigger infestations.
Giant AutoDrill - wide bore (4 radius) - average drill cycle of 7 hours - high yield, more resources - low efficiency which depletes deposits more quickly - extract multiple stone chunks, an average of three and a half (3.5) per cycle - 300% deposit consumption - 200% resource output - Can trigger infestations.
Smart AutoDrill - small bore (0.5 radius, 1x1) - average drill cycle of 12 hours - hyper-efficient - Can't cause infestation - Can't extract stone chunks - 30% deposit consumption - 100% resource output
